name: How to deal with your Ex Boyfriend who also happens to be your Co Worker
name_original: How to deal with your Ex Boyfriend who also happens to be your Co Worker
description:
Content warning: Some swearing and references to adult subjects, but should still be pretty much SFW.

Made for the Random WikiHow Jam #2 where we had 48 hours to create a game about the topic of a random WikiHow article. The article the random number god blessed me with was "How to Deal With Your Ex Boyfriend Who Happens to Be a Co Worker".  The article recommends a "reasonable" and "professional" approach to the issue. But that would have made for a really boring game. So I decided to take another route: Get the asshole fired, so you don't have to look at him every day.

I decided to go for an interactive 3d experience which focuses on a story rich experience where no overcomplicated game mechanics distract from... yes it's a walking simulator. But I hope you will like the characters I created. I would love to read some feedback on my writing. (And yes, I know Stanley calls the PC "Cassie" instead of "Carrie" - I noticed that mistake literally 2 minutes after the deadline).

Third party assets used:

Floor texture:
from "Yughues Free Fabric Materials" from the Unity Asset Store

Music:
Funkorama by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/3788-funkorama
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

New things I tried for the first time during this game jam:

  • Painting textures in Blender
  • Creating a game which is all narrative and almost no game mechanics
